trans-unit.source: Applying this attribute to an XML Web service client using HTTP-GET or HTTP-POST, sets the types that serialize the parameters sent to an XML Web service method and read the response from the XML Web service method.

If an XML Web service client calls an XML Web service method using HTTP-GET, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter%2A> must be set to `XmlReturnReader` and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute.ParameterFormatter%2A> set to `UrlParameterWriter`.

XML Web service clients invoking a XML Web service using HTTP-POST must set <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter%2A> to `XmlReturnReader` and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute.ParameterFormatter%2A> to `HtmlFormParameterWriter`.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute"></xref>.

Initializes the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter"></xref> property to a <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that deserializes the response from an XML Web service method.

Initializes the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute.ParameterFormatter"></xref> property to a <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that serializes parameters sent from an XML Web service client to an XML Web service method.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that serializes parameters sent from an XML Web service client to the XML Web service method.

If the XML Web service client is invoking an XML Web service method using HTTP-GET or HTTP-POST, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute.ParameterFormatter%2A> must be `XMLReturnReader`.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that serializes parameters sent from an XML Web service client to an XML Web service method.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that deserializes the response from an XML Web service method.

If the XML Web service client is invoking an XML Web service method using HTTP-GET, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter%2A> must be `UrlParameterWriter`, whereas a client using HTTP-POST must set <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter%2A> to `HtmlFormParameterWriter`.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that deserializes the response from an XML Web service method.
